lyrics.text:
Kuo u fakamolemole
Ho’o ngaahi hia;
‘E tali puna hake ai,
Hoku laumālie.

Mei hoku sino kovi,
‘I he’ene pehē;
Pea u fiefia lahi
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei.

Pea u lele hake leva
‘I he hala lelei;
Ke u ‘ilo, pea u vikia,
‘A hoku Huhu’i.

‘E ‘ikai te u manavahē,
Ki he ngaahi kovi;
‘O heli, pe ko e mate,
Ka te u ‘oho atu.

Ko e ‘ofa mo e tui,
Te u kapakau’aki,
Pea te u ikuna’aki,
Pea u fa’a lava’i.
